alternatives.desc: Created by people like you and free to use under an open license.

alternatives.desc: Firefox is an open source browser, backed by the Mozilla Foundation.

alternatives.name: Brave Browser
alternatives.desc: Brave is an open source, new-generation browser.

alternatives.name: Tor Browser
alternatives.desc: Tor Browser is a modified version of Firefox, which protects your privacy by connecting to the Tor network.

alternatives.name: Matrix / Element
alternatives.desc: An open network for secure, decentralized communication.

alternatives.name: Mastodon
alternatives.desc: Mastodon is the most popular email-like decentralized social network.

alternatives.name: Friendica
alternatives.desc: Friendica is a Facebook-style social network.

alternatives.name: Better World Books
alternatives.desc: Better World Books is an online bookshop, which donates one book to charity for every book it sells.

alternatives.name: Hive
alternatives.desc: Hive is a wholesaler-run site, which lets you order books online.

alternatives.name: Kobo
alternatives.desc: Kobo is a global eBook seller, and the most comprehensive alternative to Kindle.

alternatives.name: Public Domain eBooks
alternatives.desc: This tool allows searching for classic eBooks that are in the public domain.

alternatives.name: Open Library
alternatives.desc: Open Library is a Goodreads-style site for borrowing and downloading eBooks.

alternatives.name: Libreture
alternatives.desc: Libreture is a Goodreads-style site, which lets you store and organise your DRM-free eBooks online.

alternatives.name: Inventaire
alternatives.desc: Inventaire is a libre volunteer-run book lending site.

alternatives.name: Calibre
alternatives.desc: Calibre is a well-established and popular libre app, which lets you organise your eBook collection.

alternatives.desc: Mastodon is the most popular email-like decentralized social network.

alternatives.name: Friendica
alternatives.desc: Friendica is a Facebook-style social network.

alternatives.name: PeerTube

alternatives.name: OpenLibrary
alternatives.desc: Internet Archive is building OpenLibrary as a better alternative to GoodReads

alternatives.name: Tutanota
alternatives.desc: Tutanota is an encrypted email and calendar service, based in Germany.

alternatives.name: ProtonMail
alternatives.desc: ProtonMail is a Swiss-based email service, with no advertising and maximum possible privacy for its users.

alternatives.name: Posteo
alternatives.desc: Posteo is an email service, with no advertising.

alternatives.name: Fastmail
alternatives.desc: Fastmail is an Australian company that offers private email, funded entirely by its users.

alternatives.name: Soverin
alternatives.desc: Soverin hosts privacy-oriented email and website, based in the Netherlands.

alternatives.name: Thexyz
alternatives.desc: Thexyz is a Canadian company, offering privacy-conscious business email.

alternatives.name: Kolab Now
alternatives.desc: Kolab Now is a Swiss email provider with lots of extra services, aimed at business people.

alternatives.name: mailbox.org
alternatives.desc: Run by a German family business, mailbox.org offers email, online file storage and online office features.

alternatives.name: Write Freely
alternatives.desc: Write Freely is a blogging service, like Medium, where the focus is on the text itself, with a clean uncluttered aesthetic.

alternatives.name: Plume
alternatives.desc: Plume is an open source federated blogging platform, which lets you create a federated blog.

alternatives.name: WordPress
alternatives.desc: WordPress is an open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or an app.

alternatives.name: GetTogether
alternatives.desc: GetTogether is a free open source event management site.

alternatives.name: Open Sports
alternatives.desc: Sports alternative for Meetup.com

alternatives.name: searx
alternatives.desc: Searx is an open source “metasearch” engine.

alternatives.name: Mojeek
alternatives.desc: Mojeek is a web search engine based in the United Kingdom.

alternatives.name: Qwant
alternatives.desc: Qwant is a search engine based in Europe, which doesn’t track users or personalise results.

alternatives.name: DuckDuckGo
alternatives.desc: DuckDuckGo is the most popular and easiest to use privacy-conscious search engine.

alternatives.name: Libro.fm
